Title: Egypt’s EGAS offers four LNG cargoes loading in May
Description: Egypt’s state-owned EGAS has issued a tender to sell four cargoes that will load in May at the 5 mtpa Damietta LNG plant. The tender closes on Apr. 26.
Author: CK

Title: Argentina’s IEASA seeks 12 June-July LNG cargoes for Bahia Blanca, Escobar
Description: Argentina’s state-owned energy firm IEASA is seeking a total of 12 LNG cargoes for delivery in June and July to its two LNG receiving terminals the 6.1 mtpa Escobar and the 3.7 mtpa Bahia Blanca through a tender closing on Apr. 27.
Author: CK
